title: OpenAI Unveils Groundbreaking 'Phoenix-10' Model with Advanced Reasoning
description: OpenAI today announced Phoenix-10, a new flagship model boasting significant improvements in multi-modal reasoning and long-context understanding. Early benchmarks show a 30% improvement over GPT-4o.

title: Global AI Safety Consortium Agrees on New 'Red Line' Protocols
rewritten_title: AI SAFETY CONSORTIUM SETS NEW RULES
description: After months of negotiation, the Global AI Safety Consortium has published its first set of binding safety protocols for developers of frontier AI models, focusing on preventing misuse and ensuring transparency.

title: Google DeepMind Researchers Discover Novel Approach to AI Generalization
description: A new paper from Google DeepMind introduces a technique called 'Recursive Invariant Synthesis' that allows AI models to generalize to unseen tasks more effectively, potentially overcoming a key hurdle in AGI development.
